Want to SELL MiniMelts?

Are you looking for a solid business opportunity with no franchise fees and sweet profits? Partner with Mini Melts!

Mini Melts has been in Canada for over 15 years and is currently offered at hundreds of retailers across Canada such as movie theaters, amusement parks, convenience stores, gas stations, family fun centres and more. We are a trusted brand with a unique premium product and an established consumer base.  

Mini Melts offers a variety of partnership opportunities for existing businesses. We supply and maintain our branded points of sale at no cost to you. All you need to do is install our special -40c freezer in your location and watch the profits roll in! It’s that simple!

Learn more
MINI Melts is actually BIG
Over 35 countries around the globe

In the 20 years since Tom Mosey revolutionized the ice cream industry with his patented cryogenic freezing technology, Mini Melts has taken over the world! The delicious kernels made with liquid nitrogen have quickly won the hearts of kids and adults alike. The Mini Melts brand is currently sold in over 35 countries around the world in North America, South America, Asia, the Middle East, Europe and Australia.

Over US $100 million in global sales yearly

Mini Melts has been operating in Canada for over 15 years and is still in a major growth phase. You will find Mini Melts vending machines in Cineplex and Landmark movie theaters across Canada. If you have a very busy venue with very high traffic contact us about placing a vending machine or mini freezer in your location. Our retailers are telling us that Mini Melts ice cream outsells traditional ice cream 5 to 1!

National distribution across Canada:
coast to coast

Mini Melts ice cream is enjoyed by Canadians throughout the year rain or shine. To make sure the world’s coldest ice cream stays nice and cold - we take care of the distribution ourselves. From children's play centers, zoos, amusement parks to convenience stores and gas stations - we deliver and maintain our special super cold freezers to ensure the ultimate customer experience.
We have thousands of  partners who have already jumped on board and we are constantly expanding our network. Are you looking for a solid business opportunity that guarantees sweet profits? Then check our partnership opportunities here.

QUALITY INGREDIENTS

At Mountain Top Foods we are dedicated to creating superior food products using meats and ingredients of only the best quality. We take special care in crafting each one of our recipes to ensure the highest standard for both taste and overall quality. Our production process involves the strict production guidelines so you know that you are consistently getting a great quality product each and every time!

ENTERTAINING MADE EASY

Have a crowd to feed? Impress your guests with restaurant quality appetizers. Choose from our line of scrumptious asian inspired dishes or pub classics. The best part is they’re ready in just 15 mins! Entertaining has never been easier or more delicious!

A WIDE VARIETY OF TASTE SENSATIONS

Get to know our full lineup of mouth-watering asian inspired dishes and easy to prepare, delectable pub classics. With so much variety, there’s always a new flavour to treat your tastebuds to, weather you’re hosting a party or just need a quick meal that’s sure to please the whole family. Welcome to Vyefield Enterprises Ltd.



Vyefield Enterprises is a multi-faceted private company that is owned and managed by the Kielstra family. Our family is honoured to provide Western Canadians with a variety of food products and other wares. Vyefield's corporate head office is located in Calgary, Alberta.


Vyefield Enterprises is made up of the following five divisions:
    The Dutch Store - Dutch Import Grocery & Gift Ware
    Mountain View Poultry - Poultry Sales
    Shirra/Panwest Sales - General Merchandise Sourcing, Sales & Distribution
    SR Blending Inc. - Bakery Manufacturing & Supply
    Vyefield Cattle Co. - Dairy Operation

Creating Sustainable Value Chains
Company
NewCold is one of the fastest growing advanced automated warehouse and cold chain logistics companies today.

We have proven, extensive experience, and are dedicated to developing world-class systems that are energy efficient and maximize productivity for food companies across the globe. NewCold is creating sustainable value chains by disrupting the conventional.

 

Our fully integrated end-to-end supply chain solutions include automated warehouses and transport, and seamlessly merge with our customers’ ERP systems.

 

As industry pioneers, we deliver significant footprint, labor, and energy reductions to help customers save on warehousing costs. We develop and use our own proprietary, state-of-the-art technology – including automated storage and retrieval systems – to increase food safety, provide unparalleled supply chain traceability, and prioritize sustainability.

Advanced Logistics
Our advanced refrigerated logistics processes are unmatched in the industry offering cold supply chains that are sustainable, traceable, and fully integrated with our customers.
View
Technology
Our technology totally reshapes cold chain logistics as it is formed with the latest advances in automation and technology at its core, integrated with our customers, operating seamlessly end to end.
View
Sustainability
We recognize the importance of our sustainability commitments and are creating sustainable value chains by continuously innovating and bringing smart solutions to life.
View
Facilities
Our global presence
NewCold has a global network with 18 locations operating on three continents and additional sites under construction. In total, NewCold offers over 1,555,700 pallet positions and serve our customers with a global team of over 2,000 employees.

why choose nudemarkt

nudemarkt is dedicated to making nutritious and sustainable food accessible to everyone. This commitment inspired us to create nudemarkt 100% Natural Nut Butters—delicious, plant-based protein solutions that are free from additives and packed with rich flavor. Enjoy a wholesome snack that aligns with your health goals while supporting a sustainable future!

Peanuts and almonds stand out as two of the most favored nut choices. Their crispy texture, enjoyable flavor, and numerous health benefits make them a popular snack among those who prioritize their well-being. Both peanuts and almonds provide a rich source of plant-based protein, making them beneficial components of any diet. When it comes to minerals, both varieties are high in magnesium, which is vital for maintaining bone health, supporting muscle function, and regulating blood pressure.

nudemarkt 100% Natural Nut Butters are more than just a spread; they’re the future of food.

OLAF PACKAGING
Packaging Solutions for Evolving Needs
ContactRead More
WHO WE ARE

Founded by Harold Wang in 1984, Olaf Packaging, our family business, has remained focussed on fresh food packaging in Western Canada. We work closely with our customers to understand their needs, design their packaging and help optimize their supply chain. Whether it’s clamshells to protect delicate products, flexible packaging for high-speed packing and cost efficiency or controlled atmosphere packaging to double and even triple shelf-life, we have become a trusted partner to our select group of customers. We will always honour the core values my father instilled: trust, loyalty and hard work.

WHAT WE DO

We believe fresh food packaging in Western Canada is too expensive due to many layers of mark-up. We also believe there is not enough choice because the industry is dominated by large players who dictate what is available. We help our customers design customized packaging and then source it at factory-direct pricing. 

 

CLAMSHELLS & TRAYS

These are the perfect packaging for produce and products that require extra protection.

COMPOSTABLES

The need for eco friendly packaging is more important now than ever.

FLEXIBLE PACKAGING

These include pouches, bags, and rollstock. The most versatile packaging around.

CONTROLLED ATMOSPHERE PACKAGING

Double or even triple shelf life with controlled atmosphere packaging.

WHY OLAF

With over 35 years of developing a network of packaging designers and manufacturers, we have compiled the team to get the job done properly and our purchasing power ensures it is also cost-effective. Our process oversees all aspects from design to QC to final delivery. Thus ensuring peace of mind and keeping the project on budget.

 

Did you know...

85% of shoppers perceive in-store factors (price, packaging, shelf displays) as more influential than out-of-store marketing. 

GMA, Booz & Co., and SheSpeaks Shopper Marketing 3.0

Chocolate with the story
Our Little Story

Flash forward to today.  Olivier’s utilizes the latest technologies and is a thriving modern operation.  While we have gained the advantages of modernization, we have not lost the old time flavor and spirit that started with Gaspard.

2019

Gaspard Olivier first fired up the copper kettles back in 1909 in Calgary , Alberta , Canada. Establishing a bake shop in the heart of downtown, Gaspard soon expanded his bakery offerings to include candy and ice cream. Known as "The Geisha", the brightly decorated shop became a popular social gathering place for Calgary residents on a Saturday evening.

1909

Gaspard sold the original shop in 1913, and soon opened another candy shop in Medicine Hat. By 1924 he was back in Calgary where he set up a candy factory and retail store just two blocks from his original location at 1005 1St. S.W.

1924

Producing sweets for his faithful customers, Gaspard continues on for over 62 years in the candy business before finally hanging up the apron in 1971.

1971

Flash forward to today.  Olivier’s utilizes the latest technologies and is a thriving modern operation.  While we have gained the advantages of modernization, we have not lost the old time flavor and spirit that started with Gaspard.

Our Calgary Warehousing Services

We offer a wide range of warehousing services at our Calgary location. Our main areas of focus include but are not limited to the following.

Cross-Docking Services

Streamline transportation with direct transfer from incoming to outgoing trucks, minimizing storage and expediting delivery.

Transloading

We bridge multiple transportation modes efficiently, enhancing connectivity across North American and international supply chains.

Container Stuffing & De-Stuffing

Package and transport large quantities of goods effortlessly with our expert container stuffing and de-stuffing services.

Pick-and-Pack

Our customized and agile pick and pack services deliver precision and efficient handling for products in various industries and sectors.

Specialized Handling

Our specialized equipment and custom forklift attachments help us handle uniquely shaped cargo safely to ensure integrity throughout transit.

Short & Long Term Storage

Get flexible storage options to adjust to market fluctuations, providing responsive short-term solutions or long-term warehousing.

Racked & Non-Racked Storage

Our Calgary warehouse provides racked and non-racked storage solutions to meet the complex needs of various products & industries.

Inventory Management

Achieve seamless control over stored items through our systematic monitoring to optimize stock levels and retrieval for streamlined operations.

Storage Trailers

Secure excess inventory or equipment on-site conveniently with our flexible short-term and long-term storage trailers.

Secure Yard Storage

Our secure yard storage services are ideal for large vehicles, containers, and gear in Calgary that require safe and affordable storage.

Transportation Options Available

Our asset-based fleet of trucks and trailers offers numerous transportation options including FTL, LTL, regional deliveries, and more.

Many Market Sectors Served

We provide experienced warehousing and transportation services to multiple industries, including food, beverage, and electronics.

Potato Types in Alberta




All potatoes are not created equal! They all have a different taste, size, color and texture. There are so many to choose from.

 Fun Facts




The potato was first domesticated in South America around 5,000 BC to 8,000 BC.

Potato Nutrition




Potatoes are loaded with an abundance of vitamins and minerals. A medium sized baked potato has more Vitamin C than 3 apples.

Due to the overwhelming public support for Prairie Gardens and other local farms in the region, Sturgeon County has now adopted a new approach to Agriculture and Tourism in the region with a new take on Agri-tourism!

We are a working sustainable family farm. We grow 35 acres of heirloom and specialty vegetables.
Our goal is to connect visitors back to the land, to each other and to a simpler time. Covid-19 has had a huge affect on our day-to-day, as it has many Albertans. We are excited to introduce new activities this summer and fall that allow families to enjoy our farm while staying healthy and safe.

The Purple Gem Orchard

Purple Gem Farms was an idea that came to fruition. Our orchard in Millet, Alberta, south of Edmonton, saw 1500 pounds of Saskatoon berries, in the first year of production in 2016. We are expecting a harvest of over 56,000 pounds yearly.

Order
 
Saskatoons
 
Recipes
Delivering Quality Berries 

We sell our amazing Saskatoon berries to local restaurants, bakeries, processors, brewers, distillers, food manufacturers, retailers and direct sales to consumers. Serving Edmonton, Leduc, Millet, Beaumont and surrounding areas. We operate our orchard under the CanadaGAP Program. This is a third party, audited program that ensures the food safety for fresh fruits and vegetables. We follow these protocols because we care about selling safe products to our consumers and processors. We've even included some great recipes to use our berries in, too!

 
YouTube
 

"Purple Gem Farms is dedicated to the production of high quality saskatoon berries that contribute to a healthy lifestyle for our customers."

Quality Fast Foods knows the sandwich business better than anyone. Fresh, delicious, convenient sandwiches and burgers that will satisfy your customers’ cravings—every time.

EXPERTS. PARTNERS.
INNOVATORS.

Rangeland Engineering is a full-service engineering, procurement and construction management (EPCM) company based in Western Canada. Through our client partnerships, industry experience, and use of technology, we’re developing new and innovative ways to solve challenges, meet regulations and increase productivity.

We support the entire project lifecycle—from feasibility studies to detailed engineering design to commissioning and start-up. Our complete engineering services include process, pipeline, mechanical, piping, civil, structural, electrical, and instrumentation & control disciplines.

MORE ABOUT SERVICES
Our Latest Projects
Prince Rupert Marine Terminal

The Prince Rupert Terminal (PRT) will receive 3,975 m3/day (25,000 bbl/day) of propane via rail from Alberta (namely, Pembina’s Redwater Fractionation and Storage Facility) and offload into pressurized storage spheres via compressed gas displacement.

Continue Reading
Eavor Demonstration Project

This innovative project received federal funding from
 Natural Resources Canada’s Clean Growth Program
 and Sustainable Development Technology Canada,
that went toward construction of this demonstration
facility.

Continue Reading
Redwater Fractionation Site III

After its commissioning, the Redwater Fractionation Site (RFS) III project facility will become part of Canada’s largest NGL fractionation and storage complex.

Continue Reading
Alberta Saskatchewan Intertie and Storage (ASISt) Project

The ASISt project will be one of only a few utility scale Diabatic Compressed Air Energy Storage (D-CAES) facilities worldwide. Utilizing excess renewable power (solar, wind, etc) the unit will compress air in to underground salt storage caverns.

Continue Reading

of Fresh Produce


Our growers use generations of experience to hand pick only the most flavourful varieties of produce and ensure they are grown right. Artisan salsa, Made in Alberta
Taste the difference
 
Welcome to
Red House Salsa 

Red House Salsa is a family driven business established in 2016 and proudly operates in St. Albert. We passionately craft our quality Salsa with various flavours and textures that are sure to surprise, excite and inspire.

 

We work our magic in small batches so you can expect slight variations; but we quality check our butts off, you can be sure to always love it! You will find fresh ingredients in our salsa, and you can taste the difference. 

 

All of our salsa is 100% VEGAN with no added gluten
and made in a 500ml glass jar, that can be re-used because
the environment matters to us.

Ready-Made Meals
Serving wholesale food suppliers throughout Alberta, Red Table prepares individual pre-packaged ready-made meals, sandwiches, sides, salads, and bulk food items in high volume.
Yum!
Our Culinary Capabilities

Following strict standards established in the Safe Food for Canadians Regulations, Red Table has a fully integrated process to support you from recipe development and meal production to packaging and distribution.

Recipe Development
Production Kitchen
QA & Lab Testing
Packaging & Labeling
Distribution
High-Capacity Production Kitchen

From our 25,000 sq. ft. kitchen and production facility based in Edmonton, we have the capacity to prepare up to 30,000 menu items every day with delivery across Alberta. If you’ve ever wondered what goes into preparing thousands of delicious ready-made meals every day without sacrificing taste, presentation, and quality of ingredients, then click below to watch the video.

0
Meals Prepared Daily
Play Video
Serving delight in every meal
Why Partner with Red Table?

When it comes time to evaluate your next ready-made meal partner, we understand that trust and confidence weigh heavily in your decision. Aside from sourcing delicious products that your customers will crave, the continuity of your business and your brand’s reputation are equally important.

The value we provide to our customers is based on three core principles (RT3) that guide decisions on how we manage our operations:

1
Food Safety

You can be confident in the safety and integrity of our production environment. We ensure strict protocols built on CFIA-approved preventative measures.

2
Consistency

We never compromise. Not on our workflow, quality of ingredients, taste, or presentation. This ensures consistency in every meal we produce.

3
Savings

Our capacity and proven production efficiencies result in time and cost savings when producing meals in high volume. These savings go directly to your bottom-line profits.

Let’s Connect!

If you’d like more information on how Red Table can support your ready-made meal program, click below to book your consultation today.

Our Company

We promise we will only use the best and freshest products available in the market place to create our culinary food products. Our mission is to educate people of the gastronomical food delights that exist in our world.

Sgambaro’s welcomes and invites you to visit the products we offer. Atlantic Cold Smoked Salmon (Lox), Gravlax, Salmon Sausage, Salmon Pate with Lemon Pepper Crust, Atlantic Salmon Jerky, Wild Sockeye Salmon Jerky, Wild Icelandic Cold Smoked Arctic Char, Salmon Burgers and Three Mustard Dill Sauce. Also, when in season, we offer a Wild Sockeye Salmon (Lox).

The Chef behind Sgambaros Signature Seafoods

Sgambaro’s is owned and operated by Roberto Sgambaro CCC. A professional chef with 3 decades of cooking experience. Roberto has had extensive training in Toronto, Montreal and France.

2004-2005 were very good years for Roberto Sgambaro CCC. His business plan presentation captured the Grand Prize in the Edmonton Region Venture Prize competition. This win, dedicated hard work, and resulting notoriety is propelling his smoked salmon product line to great success.

Awards

In 2013 Sgambaro’s won a Food Award for their Atlantic Cold Smoked Salmon. Presented by the Alberta Food Processors Association, Sgambaro’s won in the category of “Best Value Added Specialty Meat, Poultry or Seafood Product”.

In 1986, Roberto achieved his Red Seal and Journeyman Certificate. In 1994, Roberto went on and successfully completed his “Chef De Cuisine” program, earning him a degree and certification, a feat that only 300 others in Canada had accomplished at that time. That same year he became a member of the Association of Chefs De Cuisine of Edmonton. A key branch of the Canadian Federation of Chefs De Cuisine.

Sgambaros Signature Seafoods is born

Although Roberto had entered and won medals at culinary competitions, his greatest achievement had yet to come. In 1995, the concept of “Sgambaro’s” was born. Originally named “Experience Gastronomique” defined as “the art of good eating.” Therein lays the core of Roberto’s mission; to present individuals with locally made and handcrafted, quality artisanal foods.

Thus, the foundation for Sgambaros Signature Seafoods has always been and will always remain to be fine quality foods allowing people to expand their palate.

Roberto remains your “Chef De Cuisine”

WHY SOUPTACULAR?

It’s not just soup – It’s an experience!

Souptacular provides healthy and delicious soups to our Soup-er Fans across Canada. Our flavours are family-friendly, easy to customize, and economical.  With a pantry stocked with Souptacular, you can always add a nutritious soup course to your meal.  

When you choose Souptacular, you make it easy to create healthy meals for yourself and your family.  Our soups serve 8 cups, and any extra soup can be frozen for a Soup-er easy work lunch or side dish. 

Chefs of all skill levels can create warm and satisfying meals by following the simple directions on the package: “Just Add Water!”

Soup Flavours

ALBERTA BLUE CROSS

Testimonial

In 2017, we purchased Souptacular soup mixes for our employees as a corporate appreciation gift. Our key criteria when looking for employee gift items is that they are made in Alberta….

See Testimonials
EASY SOUP RECIPE

Just Add Water!

Stove Top: Add Souptacular mix and included seasoning to 8-10 cups water or low-sodium broth. Partially cover and gently boil for 2 hours.

Crockpot: Use 8 cups of water or low-sodium broth and cook on medium or high for 6-8 hours. All crockpots vary in temperature. The longer the soup cooks, the better it gets!

If Desired: When soup is almost cooked, add fresh market vegetables and meats such as fried ground Alberta beef or bison, leftover chicken or turkey, ham, bacon or sausage.

More Recipe Ideas

SPRAGG’S MEAT SHOP & FARM

Specializing in Alberta Raised, Sustainably Farmed, Free-Range Pork

From Our Farm to Your Table: Albertans Feeding Albertans 

Spragg’s Meat Shop is a family owned and operated farm and business, with retail locations in Calgary and Rosemary, Alberta. We are committed to ethical farming practices that support a healthy environment for our free-range pigs, and the community as a whole. Featuring products from local farmers and producers, walking into Spragg’s Meat Shop is like stepping into a mini farmer’s market. We are passionate about feeding Alberta families like our own. Whether you’re shopping for meat, baked goods, or produce, you can count on us for the best local foods Alberta has to offer. 

ABOUT US

Bonnie, Greg and Ruth Spragg work hard to produce the best pork for Albertans, from the moment the pigs are born, to the day the pork chops are cut, bacon is smoked, and the roast is marinated. From farm to table, our focus is on quality and taste.

LEARN MORE

Sunlight, fresh air and an open pasture do amazing things for the pork flavour. It tastes better knowing that the pigs were happily raised in a low stress environment.

CAREERS

About Us

Stanfos Inc. was established in 1974 in Edmonton, Alberta, and is located in an 8,000-square-foot office and warehouse complex on the southeast side of the city.  The company was originally founded as Stainless Food Systems and Supplies Limited. Later, it was decided that while the name fit, it was limiting to the overall scope of what kind of a company that was envisioned.  In expanding the business, we consolidated the long moniker into the shortened Stanfos. The new name reflected the spirit of the humble beginnings while building on the organization’s dedication to helping businesses across Western Canada and beyond.

Today, our focus is to supply quality products and services. From plant layout consulting and training, to equipment supply, installation, commissioning and service, we have experienced and qualified personnel in the areas of instrumentation, AutoCAD, automation, welding, pipefitting and fabrication. Stanfos is a nationally recognized distributor of sanitary stainless steel fittings, parts, tubing and valves as well as pumps, meters, pasteurizers and all other process equipment. Stanfos also holds a Canadian Patent (#2,059,511) on the CIP-able Vacuum Breaker. Stanfos specializes in food industry sanitary welding and repair, as well as fabrication of equipment, tanks, conveyors, pump units, valve clusters and flow control panels. 

FEATURED PRODUCTS
Products
Fittings & Tube

All fittings can be combined to create any desired combination.  Don't see what you are looking for?  Let us know, we probably stock it! We stock sanitary tubing from 1/4" up to 4".  We also carry stainless steel pipe, available in size from 1/8" up to 12", as well as a full line of stainless steel pipe fittings.

Process Measurement

We carry a full line of sanitary and marine instrumentation, including everything from flow, temperature, conductivity, turbidity, pressure, weight, pH, ORP and more.  Whatever the application, we have a solution.

 

Controls & Automation

Stanfos offers full and scalable PLC systems for your processing demands.  Available as stand alone, or fully integrated, these systems are often more affordable than you may think.  We also design and program HMI interfaces for your specific application.

Valves & Accessories

Stanfos offers every type of sanitary valve available, from butterfly valves to mix proof valves.  Most valves have an option of elastomers and connections.

Pumps & Motors

Stanfos offers a complete line of pumps for both sanitary and non sanitary applications.  We specialize in complete pump assemblies to fit your needs, no matter what you're pumping.

Process Equipment

From inception to implementation, we can help improve your process, in both quantity and quality.  With our experience and expertise, we are able to provide consultation, design, AutoCAD & layout, material procurement, fabrication and start-up/commissioning.  Once your new process is up and running, look to us for continued support, as well as future improvements and upgrades.  Click below to start the process and request a quote.  We will meet with you to determine your exact requirements and start the process.

Seals, Gaskets & Lubes

Stanfos stocks thousands of gaskets for all of the widely used sanitary fittings.  In addition we have access to thousands more, so what ever you need, we can get it.  We can even custom fabricate gaskets for your hard to find replacements.  We also carry a full line of plate heat exchanger gaskets for nearly every make and model available.

Custom Products

Stanfos can design and build almost anything.  If you can think of it, we can make it a reality!  Some of our commonly requested items are Stingers, Handrails, Carts, Tanks, Hose Assemblies, Garment Racks, Conveyors, Fireplace Mantles, Counter tops, Sculptures and more...

SERVICES
SELECT ONE OF OUR SERVICES BELOW TO EXPLORE MORE.
SERVICES
SHOP SERVICES
Welding
Repairs or new construction, speciallizing in stainless steel and sanitary applications.
Fabrication
Equipment, tanks, conveyors, stands, valve clusters, and more.

Let us know your pumping needs and we can design and fabricate a custom pump unit for your application.

From simple temperature, flow and pressure controls to full PLC automation packages. All systems are custom designed and built in our Edmonton shop.
Design Services
We will help create plant floor layouts, dimensional and isometric drawings, machine specifications, etc., including full blueprinting services up to “E” size available.
FIELD SERVICES

Commissioning

Instrumentation

SUPPLY SERVICES
Conveyors
Table top, incline, spiral, and more. We custom design all conveyors specifically for your needs.
Fillers/Packaging
We supply food and beverage fillers and packaging equipment to the industry. Need something you can't find? Let us design one, just for you.
Pasteurizing Equipment

OUR STORY 
THE HOME OF INTERNATIONAL AWARD-WINNING MEADS - WORLD MEAD CHALLENGE WINNERS〰️THE HOME OF INTERNATIONAL AWARD-WINNING MEADS - WORLD MEAD CHALLENGE WINNERS〰️THE HOME OF INTERNATIONAL AWARD-WINNING MEADS - WORLD MEAD CHALLENGE WINNERS〰️
THE HOME OF INTERNATIONAL AWARD-WINNING MEADS - WORLD MEAD CHALLENGE WINNERS 〰️

Kristeva's journey into the world of meadmaking began as a humble hobby beekeeper. In her third year of tending to her bees, they produced an impressive 450 pounds of honey. Knowing the incredible labor that goes into producing even a single teaspoon of honey, she was determined not to let this liquid gold go to waste.

Prior to this, mead had never held a special place in her heart. In fact, she had often dismissed it as unpalatable. However, on a snowy Christmas Day in 2017, she decided to take a chance. She delved into the world of mead crafting, using her own honey as the primary ingredient. To her surprise and delight, the mead that she produced was unlike any other that she and her husband, Eric, had tasted before. For them, it was a revelation.

Their mead was unique, a flavor profile distinct from the offerings found on the commercial market. It left them curious and craving more. Kristeva was not content with just savoring her newfound passion; she sought to share her creation with others. To do so, she needed unbiased opinions from the most discerning critics: judges at a mead competition.

With the courage to take a step into the unknown, she submitted her mead to a competition. The anticipation was palpable as the results were announced. To her astonishment and sheer delight, she clinched a gold medal, and the judges provided glowing feedback that lit her path forward. It was a pivotal moment that encouraged Kristeva to follow her newfound dream.

With fresh determination, she continued crafting mead throughout the year. The following year, she took her passion even further, entering five distinct meads into various competitions. To her joy, each of these meads earned medals, validating her skills and innovative approach.

As she stood before the judges to collect her fourth medal, a voice from the crowd pierced through the room. "We want to come drinking at your place!" The words resonated in her ears, marking a turning point in her journey. It was that precise moment when Kristeva made a life-altering decision: she would embark on the path of making mead on a commercial scale, sharing her unique creations with the world. The Stolen Harvest journey had just begun.

EMBRACING REGENERATIVE AGRICULTURE

At Stolen Harvest Meadery, Nothing Goes to Waste!

We are more than just passionate meadmakers; we're dedicated stewards of the land, committed to sustainability and regenerative agriculture practices. It's our belief that every resource should be utilized to its fullest potential, and nothing should go to waste. Here's how we are making a difference to our land through regenerative agriculture and our unique partnership with the help of our feathered friends.

1. Enriching the Soil with Chickens and Turkeys: In our ongoing commitment to regenerative agriculture, we've enlisted the help of some very special assistants – chickens and turkeys. These hardworking birds play a crucial role in enriching our soil. They roam freely, pecking and scratching, helping to break up compacted soil, and naturally fertilizing it with their droppings. This process enhances soil health and promotes nutrient cycling, ultimately benefiting the quality of the honey and fruit we use in our mead production.

2. Composting Meadmaking Byproducts: Meadmaking generates fruit waste products, such as pomace and leftover fruit pulp. Instead of discarding these valuable resources, we turn them into nutrient-rich compost. Our feathered friends play a part in this process too. They happily devour these byproducts, further breaking them down and turning them into organic matter that enriches the soil. This sustainable practice not only reduces waste but also ensures that our land remains fertile for future harvests. These birds also help control pests and weeds, reducing our reliance on chemical interventions.

3. Supporting Local Ecosystems: Our regenerative agriculture practices extend beyond our immediate needs. We have kept natural ponds and managed the land so there are many natural areas for wildlife to not only visit but also to make their homes on the land. By providing a habitat for wildlife, we contribute to local biodiversity and promote a balanced ecosystem. We have seen a marked increase in wild birds, bats, toads, dragon flies, and frogs. 

4. Enhancing Sustainability: Stolen Harvest Meadery believes in the concept of "closed-loop sustainability." In this system, we aim to minimize waste and maximize resource utilization. The integration of chickens and turkeys into our agricultural practices is just one example of how we're reducing our environmental footprint.

5. A Commitment to Quality: Our dedication to regenerative agriculture isn't just about being eco-conscious; it's also about ensuring the highest quality ingredients for our meads. Healthy soil, rich in nutrients, results in better fruit and honey, which in turn translates into superior mead. It's a win-win for the environment and our products.

At Stolen Harvest Meadery, we take great pride in our commitment to regenerative agriculture. We believe that nature's bounty should be honored and nothing should go to waste. Through the innovative use of chickens and turkeys in our agricultural practices, we're not only crafting exceptional meads but also nurturing the land that sustains us.

By choosing Stolen Harvest Meadery, you're not just savoring delicious mead; you're supporting a sustainable, regenerative approach to agriculture that helps preserve the environment for generations to come. We invite you to join us on this journey toward a more sustainable, responsible, and flavorful future. Cheers to a world where nothing goes to waste, and every resource is valued!

THE ULTIMATE EXPERIENCE IN TERRIOR 〰️

Well made meads can delight the senses and raise the tasting experience from ordinary to incredible – the difference of a well-crafted product is truly amazing. We believe that great meads begin with great honey. And the Canadian Prairies produce great honeys. 

We take our time to source the highest quality products from local sustainable farms. Once a year we make our Special Reserve meads whose ingredients sourced exclusively from the wild.  Stolen Harvest Mead produces the highest quality mead with a view to creating unique tasting experiences for our clientele. 

A single honeybee produces a meagre twelfth of a teaspoon of honey per day so each drop is precious. The honey used determines the overarching flavour of the mead, and can vary according to a honey bee’s particular diet of nectar and pollen. Drinking honey wine is the ultimate experience in “Terroir”.

The per capita consumption of honey in Canada is only one kilo (2.2 pounds) per year--we aim to raise that! Who would have thought that by making and drinking mead we could be part of a political movement. From saving the bees to increasing economic development. In each bottle of mead there is anywhere from two and a half to nearly six pounds of fruit or berries and between a half to two pounds of honey. This mixture is magically converted to alcohol by specially chosen yeast strains. By choosing a local mead instead of an imported one, you are not only keeping your money in your community and supporting local farms and beekeepers, but also diversifying our economy.

AT THE MEADERY

Located in scenic Grovedale, Alberta, Stolen Harvest Meadery is hand carved from the Alberta boreal forest: it is ten acres of a rural oasis.  There are hand planted gardens with a wide variety of vegetables and numerous heritage garlics growing. There is a fruit forest as well as a newly planted orchard (2018) with Saskatoons, haskaps, and prairie cherries. Each spring, the fields come alive with a symphony of wildflowers. Some, such as dandelions and wild roses, are lovingly harvested each year in anticipation of the moment when water, yeast, and local raw wildflower honey come together and magic unfolds. The property is adjacent to a larger forest where mother nature provides a bounty wild edibles, some of which make it into our micro-batch hand crafted meads. 

HOSTS

Kristeva - is a well-traveled anthropologist with a sense of adventure and a bland food phobia. She spent many years wandering the globe in search of foreign cultures and culinary adventures. She is the author of Chicken Poop for the Soul: in search of food sovereignty. The story of her self-sufficient journey towards independence by learning how to hunt, gather, and raise all her own food. What started as an experiment for a book quickly became a passion and a way of life for her. She enjoys taking  wine-lovers outside their comfort zone by introducing them to her wildly inspired meads.  

Eric  - An experienced forager, Eric can teach you how to find wild edibles even in your front lawn—a skill that gets put to use when searching for wild foraged flavours for their mead. From the sea-scapes of his family summer retreat in Cape Breton to the wilderness of Northern Ontario where he spent six months living alone in the wilderness, he has gathered from nature a variety of wild edibles. He has worked in the food industry for more than 20 years in both the role of chef and butcher. His newest passion is charcuterie and pairing his creations with Stolen Harvest Meads.

Welcome to Sunfresh Farms

Sunfresh Farms brings local Alberta grown produce from the farm to your local grocery store. We are owned by Alberta farmers who grow the best tasting and highest quality vegetables our fertile soil can produce. Most of our farmers are located within two hours of the warehouse, however, we have farms located throughout Alberta and Western Canada. We believe in responsible industry practices while following the highest food safety programs. Sunfresh Farms is a leader in food safety and we are a proud member of the BRC.

We have a wide variety of fresh fruit and vegetables not only from our farms but from many growing areas located throughout Canada, U.S.A, Mexico and Europe.

We carry Alberta grown produce items from binned fruit and vegetable products to repacked items in smaller quantities. We also specialize in processing many items. We cut, chop, dice and slice many products to various specifications.

Sunfresh Farms delivers high quality local produce to our customers while contributing to profitable growth for our local farming community. At Sunfresh Farms “produce is our passion”. We are committed to 100% order fill along with complete customer satisfaction.

Unmatched Service

Sunrise Bakery offers artisan quality and care paired with wholesale manufacturing coast-to-coast distribution capabilities. We are your wholesale baked good partners, providing you with the product delivery you need across the continent! We aren’t just a large-scale bakery, we are a food processing and manufacturing solutions provider!

We want you to have peace of mind as you work with us, knowing that we’ll always get you the products you need when you need them. Missed fulfillment rates isn’t in our vocabulary, if you need a quality Sunrise Bakery product, we’ll ensure it’s delivered to you in full, every time!

Deep in Tradition

Sunrise Bakery began as a simple, door-to-door bakery in 1963. Over the decades the bakery has evolved from a neighborhood bakery to manufacturing for some of North America’s most recognizable food brands and shipping millions of units a year. What hasn’t changed, however, is Sunrise Bakery’s commitment to taking care of our customers and our staff members.

Our team of over 100 dedicated staff is committed to your success and goes above and beyond to make sure you receive your products on time and at the quality level you expect. Many of our team members have been with us for decades, and this is because we work together, as a family! No matter how large or small Sunrise Bakery has been, at our heart we are a family business who is built on hard work and quality service.

Welcome to Thermo King Calgary

We are a Thermo King authorized Sales, Service and Parts dealership location. Thermo King is the world leader in transport temperature control systems for trucks, trailers, buses and rail cars. Thermo King also manufactures auxiliary power units, which dramatically reduce engine idling. As part of Thermo King's unmatched nationwide dealer network, we provide expert factory-trained service when and where you need it, and a complete line of genuine and competitive parts. Trust us to get you back on the road quickly and keep you up and running.

Thermo King manufactures the most dependable and durable refrigeration and heating units on the market. Through engineering innovations and continuous technological advances, Thermo King provides the largest, finest temperature control units for trucks, trailers, rail cars, and ocean-going containers around the globe. We adhere to a strict set of high standards—honesty and fair service are integral parts of who we are. We earned our excellent reputation through hard work and special attention to who really matters: you, the customer.

Need a unit for a small truck? Trailer? Portable storage unit? We’re “cool” with that!

We have the right unit for you. Our friendly and knowledgeable staff is always willing to answer questions about our products. We provide prompt and reliable service, no matter what you need.

We can take care of all your transportation refrigeration needs, as we are a factory authorized sales, service, and parts dealer for Thermo King Corporation. In addition, we can handle all your off-road air conditioning needs.

From the latest and best in refrigeration technology to the services required to keep your units running efficiently, we can get you out on the road quickly and at an affordable price. If you’re nearby, stop in and see what we can do for you. Or call or email us! We’ll be happy to assist you.

Thermo King Western (Calgary) Inc. is also an authorized dealer for Espar heaters.

Since 1973, Espar has brought state-of-the-art German technology to the North American marketplace. Known for their comprehensive range of independent and compact fuel operated heaters they’ve made a name for themselves in the transportation industry.

Eberspaecher is a family owned company who is proud of its heritage and proud of the quality products and services they provide globally. The Eberspaecher group specializes in exhaust technology, climate control systems and automotive controls. This year marks the 150 year anniversary for Eberspaecher and Espar is very proud to announce that they will officially assume the Eberspaecher name in the marketplace, while still maintaining “Espar” as a legal business entity.

If you aren’t a computer expert, then with that comes an IT department. The only problem is that hiring a full-time, dedicated IT person isn’t always the best move. WE ARE A FULL SERVICE
AMAZON BUSINESS
CONSUTLING AGENCY

Today, Amazon is the dominant platform for e-commerce sales, with nearly 50% of the North American market share and still growing. Its customer base covers all demographics, and statistics show that the heaviest users of Amazon visit the platform multiple times per week.

Your customers are on Amazon today, looking for products just like yours. Are you ready to get your products into their hands?

BOOK YOUR FREE STRATEGY CALL
HOW ARE WE DIFFERENT?

Running a successful Amazon business requires diverse skills and specialized knowledge. Success on Amazon requires more than just creating a listing and hoping your products will sell.

With four years of food manufacturing experience and nine years selling our products directly on Amazon, we have the skills and knowledge to help you, no matter if you are just starting on Amazon or want to grow your existing Amazon business.

We are full-service Amazon business consultants. Yes, we make great-looking Amazon listings, but that is only a tiny part of what it takes to be successful on Amazon.

There are only two ways to gain the skills you need for Amazon success. You can get an education and learn from personal experience through trial and error or work with a knowledgeable professional to set you up for success right from the start. That’s where we come in.

From strategic planning and competitive analysis to listing creation and advertising management, we can help you with every aspect of running your Amazon business. And unlike other service providers that disappear when you need them the most, we are here to help you every step of the way.

Book your free strategy call today to find out how we can help your business succeed on Amazon!

WE ARE FOCUED ON HELPING YOU GROW YOUR AMAZON SALES

Success on Amazon doesn’t happen by chance, it is carefully planned and executed for maximum profits.  Here is what we do:

k
Competitive Product Research

Analyze your Amazon competition and related products to develop a long term strategy and look for winning opportunities.


Product Launch Strategy

A properly planned and executed product launch can mean the difference between early success or wasted money and struggle.


Amazon Listing Optimization

Optimzed listings get higher organic visibility, higher sales, and better conversions.  Detailed optimization is key!


Brand Protection

Amazon Brand Registry unlocks ways to protect your brand, enhance your listings, and tell your unique brand story.


Amazon PPC Managment

Maximize your ROI and reduce your Advertising Cost of Sales (ACoS) with expert Pay Per Click (PPC) advertising.

OUR SKILLS

Success on Amazon requires a focused skill set.  Generic eCommerce knowledge is not enough, we are laser focused on Amazon and have extensively trained on how to optimize this sales vertical.

Most clients have found success in grocery retail, personal brick and mortar stores,  and/or a product website (Shopify).  However, Amazon constitutes almost 50% of online eCommerce today and a successful Amazon presence can add a new revenue stream equal to, or greater than offline sales.  Our skill set is focused on maximizing ROI through Branding, Optimization and PPC Advertising campaigns.     

BRANDING
LISTING OPTIMIZATION
AMAZON AD CAMPAIGNS  
IF YOU SELL OFFLINE – YOU CAN SELL ONLINE

Many clients have misconceptions about what can be sold on the Amazon marketplace.  Food and grocery make up a sizable portion of Amazon sales and there is tremendous room for growth. There are however many guidelines that must be followed, and TNT Ecommerce is here to navigate you through them.  

READY TO GET STARTED?

Our Story

Top Quality Ingredients
	

Top Health Ingredients has been a trusted B2B leader in plant-based ingredient supply for over 15 years. Our comprehensive portfolio of sustainable, non-GMO ingredient solutions undergoes rigorous analysis, both at the source and beyond, to ensure our proteins, prebiotics, fibers, sweeteners & mushrooms are free from GMOs and allergens, and meet or exceed our specifications every time.

Top Health is earnestly committed to providing food, beverage, and wellness brands with innovative and unique plant-based ingredients that help tackle the most challenging formulation obstacles - giving our clients a competitive edge in such rapidly-expanding markets. As a family-owned company, our team is unwavering in its dedication to quality, transparency, and excellence, always striving to support a healthier, more sustainable future for all.

plant-based ingredient solutions to the global market

Meet Eric & Naomi

Eric's love for food started back when he was a teenager. His folks would take extended holidays in the winter, and would leave him with a freezer full of food, some cash for fresh groceries, and a number of cookbooks. He very quickly learned what went with what, and always enjoyed creating new combinations, some worked, many didn’t at first, but he ate them anyways! 

​

He stole his wife Naomi’s heart with Italian chicken breasts with mushrooms and mozzarella cheese with Caesar salad, and the rest is history! His family’s idea of a holiday generally centered around where we could go to enjoy new cultures and exciting food experiences.

​

Naomi was fortunate enough to be raised in a household where food meant comfort and love. She learned to cook with her mother and, later, she and her husband, Eric, passed that love of good food prepared well onto their daughters. Over the years, she and Eric started to develop their own recipes and find great joy in sharing their love of food with friends and family. On a more personal level, Naomi spends a lot of her time thinking about what and when she is going to eat next.

MEET THE
BLUE SKY CITY

Great work and great life, Calgary is the place to have both. Here, ideas have room to grow and big dreams have possibility.

Scroll
CALGARY IS FOR INNOVATORS SOLVING GLOBAL CHALLENGES

The proof is in the entrepreneurs who built this city. Home to dreamers, innovators and problem-solvers embracing innovation and advanced technology. Calgary is a city that is changing with the world — and helping to change the world.

Watch Video
MAKE A LIVING, MAKE A LIFE

As Canada’s third youngest major city, Calgary is a place where everything is possible. Here, meaningful work and an exceptional lifestyle go hand-in-hand. Not only does Calgary have the highest head office concentration per capita in the country, we also have a growing startup and small business community ripe with opportunity. With a low cost of living, vibrant arts and cultural scene, and close proximity to the Rockies, Calgary really does have it all.

Our Story

CONTACT US
Trafford Farms is a family-run urban farming business that grows local produce year-round. 
At Trafford Farms, our vision is to change the world through agriculture. 

Our current food system in Canada is reliant upon fragile supply chains that deliver imported produce grown using a tremendous amount of land, water, and pesticides.  At Trafford Farms, we are challenging this increasingly unsustainable model by growing produce locally, all year round.  

Fresh

All of our produce is grown right here in Calgary, meaning it’s delivered within 24 hours of harvest.

Clean

Our produce is grown in a controlled environment that eliminates the need for pesticides and herbicides.

Consistent

Our controlled indoor growing environment ensures a delicious, high-quality harvest every time, all year round.

Taking Pet Food To The Next Level

Raw and Ready-To-Cook Dog and Cat Food

Our Recipes
OUR NUTRITIONAL EXPERTS

the team who formulated and reviewed all recipes - ensuring your pet thrives with every bite

Dr. Judy Morgan

Lead Reviewer

DVM, CVA, CVCP, CVFT




"I love that Tru-Raw has used whole food ingredients of the highest quality in its recipe formulations to supply necessary vitamins, minerals, and nutrients, rather than resorting to the addition of synthetic ingredients. The variety of single-protein sources allows pet owners to choose based on their pet's needs if they have any food intolerances. It's wonderful to have multiple options for cats, as high-quality raw cat food options are limited." 

Dr. Susan Recker

Lead Formulator


DVM, Animal Diet Formulator Expert


"It was a pleasure working with Tru-Raw on their formulations, as their goal was not only fresh food diets that are complete and balanced using impeccably-sourced ingredients, but also truly optimized diets. A wide variety of whole foods encourages microbiome diversity, and attention to the nutrient requirements of dogs and cats with varying activity levels ensures proper nutrition is accessible even to lower-activity pets, whose needs are often overlooked. I also appreciate their commitment to transparency -complete nutritional analyses for each formula are readily available, so pet parents and veterinarians can make informed decisions on feeding."

Dr. Nick Thompson

Lead Reviewer

BSc (Vet Sci) Hons, BVM&S,
VetMFHom, MRCVS.



"The Tru-Raw diets I have reviewed are very impressive. Tru-Raw has gone to great lengths to source the cleanest and best-sourced ingredients and carefully blended them to provide a range of great diets for dogs and cats. I would happily feed these diets to my brood of three sighthounds and three moggies. Your choice of food and how it is prepared are cornerstones of health for the whole family, including pets. Tru-Raw offers a powerful range of delicious options to help you optimize health for the furry family in the house. Enjoy."

OUR RECIPES

your pet's vibrant health starts here

Tru-Essential Dog
Tru-Essential Cat
TRU-ESSENTIAL RECIPES
Complete and Balanced

These recipes are formulated to meet AAFCO, FEDIAF, and NRC nutritional guidelines for all life stages. They are suitable for adult pets, puppies (including large breed puppies), kittens, and gestating or lactating pets!

Whole Food Nutrition

Crafted with premium ingredients (including CFIA-inspected humanely-raised meats, organic produce, and natural supplements), these recipes use only whole foods without the need for synthetic vitamins and minerals.

Serve Raw or Cooked

These species-appropriate recipes are rich in protein and low in carbohydrates, specifically formulated to be served raw or cooked. You can sous vide straight from the freezer or thaw to feed raw, stir-fried, or even baked!

A New Blend in Every Bowl

Got a picky eater? No problem! Switch up your pet's meals daily with our variety of recipes to keep things exciting. Each recipe features a unique mix of proteins, fruits, and vegetables for fresh flavors every time!

For our pet and yours.

Some might call it over-the-top, but we believe it’s simply a commitment to quality.

BACON MADE WITH CARE

Every slice of bacon is made using a hands on, family focused approach. We dry cure our bacon with our specially made, locally obtained spices. It is then cured for 8 days before entering our smoker.

We try our best to utilize as many local, Alberta businesses' and products as we possibly can. From our pork & spices, right down to the packaging we feel it is important to use the best quality local products that we can find.

Fresh, Local & Affordable

Voted BEST Locally Made Product in the Bow Valley in the 2024 Rocky Mountain Outlook Reader's Choice Awards!

All of our meat is prepared and packaged in a provincially inspected plant with strict guidelines that ensure the quality of the meat we serve. Delivered straight to your door every week, the quality and convenience of our meat is always guaranteed.

Plus, free delivery with every minimum order!

Shop Now

Free Home Delivery, Let Us Come To You!

Voted BEST Delivery Service in the Bow Valley in the 2024 Rocky Mountain Outlook Reader's Choice Awards!

Order online and get delivery to your home, free on every minimum order. We deliver to Calgary, Cochrane, Airdrie and Okotoks every Thursday, and within the Bow Valley every Friday.

Save time and money with our reliable delivery service and affordable prices. With our wide variety of products and cuts of meat available online, you're sure to find something that's both healthy and delicious!

Shop Now
Valbella Gourmet Foods

Established in 1978 by Walter and Leonie von Rotz in beautiful downtown Canmore, our goal was and always has been to provide the best locally produced and quality food at affordable prices.

Now, over 45 years later, our commitment to excellence paired with our European traditions and simple love for fine food, has helped us to stand out as one of Western Canada’s most recognized meat processors.

When you choose us, you’re not just getting a meal—you’re enjoying the finest Donair and Gyros available, crafted with passion and precision.

The Art of Contemporary Drinking
We believe that drinking together creates connection. But in a world where alcohol has traditionally been central to social gatherings, contemporary drinking defines a new way to partake. It's a new kind of social ritual that focuses on making everyone feel free to drink the way they want. After all, the real value of a drink lies in the conversation and connection with the people you share it with.

Embrace the freedom, inclusivity and presence/mindfulness that come along with our new approach to modern drinking culture.

Winter’s Turkeys 
Whole GrainFed, Free Range & Organic Turkeys

Welcome to Winter's Turkey Farm, nestled in the southern prairies just 30 km east of Calgary. Our turkeys are raised with utmost care, ensuring their comfort, health, and well-being. With plenty of space to roam in sunshine and fresh air, our turkeys are raised free range and are whole grain fed. 

Experience the freshness of our turkeys during Thanksgiving and Christmas with our available fresh turkeys. For year-round enjoyment, we offer frozen turkeys and other turkey products available at various retail outlets or directly from our farm.

ABOUT OUR FARM
Naturally Raised,Naturally Better

Since 1958, we have proudly produced Winter's Turkeys, with a commitment to quality and sustainability. Our flocks primarily consist of hens, raised to a plump 17 to 22 pounds for an excellent finish and naturally self-basting, delicious flavor.

SHOP NOW

Valuable insights on various aspects of turkey preparation, including defrosting a frozen turkey, smoking techniques, delicious recipes, & more.
LEARN MORE

Turkey Tips

 Find out more information on how to procure a fresh turkey for Thanksgiving and Christmas. Frozen turkeys and products also available.
LEARN MORE

Farm Pickup

Discover detailed responses to your questions about our farm, our practices, organic and free-range methods, and more.
LEARN MORE

FAQ
Whole Grain Fed

At Winter's Turkeys, we take pride in our carefully crafted feed program that has been developed and perfected over generations, starting with Grandpa Jack. Our turkeys are fed a whole grain diet with a base of whole wheat, ensuring they receive optimal nutrition.

Our carefully crafted feed program, developed over generations, ensures optimal nutrition for our turkeys. It begins when they arrive as day-old poults and includes a fine, crumbled feed for the first four weeks, gradually increasing whole wheat until it reaches 90% by week 14. Our organic turkeys are fed a farm-mixed diet of organic wheat, soy meal, flax or canola meal, peas, and minerals, with gradual inclusion of whole wheat. We are dedicated to providing top-quality nutrition through our expertly designed feed program.

Regenerative Agriculture & ETHICAL Care

We prioritize the humane treatment of our birds, ensuring their comfort and well-being at all times. They are provided with clean bedding, have unlimited access to fresh water and the outdoors, and are fed a whole-grain diet. As stewards of sustainability, we are committed to practicing environmentally responsible farming while maintaining respectful husbandry for our animals.

X-TREME Operating Philosophy

X-TREME Packaging Services Inc. is a manufacturer and supplier of corrugated products and services.  In our early days, we began as a service provider to the corrugated industry however, we have evolved into a full service one stop shop for corrugated packing products and services.  While Service remains a huge part of our business, we like to think we have differentiated ourselves from others in our industry by offering packaging solutions through creative design and innovation.  We have and will continue to treat all employee’s with courtesy and respect. We involve them in building our process, helping us meet, or exceed our clients expectations and needs.

Mission Statement

To deliver the highest quality services and products to our clients, ensuring we understand their business, their needs and their products. We will achieve this by listening to our clients and recommending the best possible solutions through employee involvement and total accountability for the quality of our services and products.

Proudly Family Owned

When you buy from a family owned business, you are not helping a CEO buy a third vacation home.
You are helping a little girl get dance lessons, a little boy get his hockey jersey, a mom and/or dad put food on the table, a family to pay their mortgage, or a student pay for college.
Our Customers are our share holders, and they are the ones who we strive to make happy. We may be called a small business, but we have a LARGE capacity for quality and care.

Safety Beliefs

At X-TREME Packaging, we believe the safety of our employees paramount. Safety is not a program, or a FAD, it is a way of life. Our employee's are trained in and expected to follow safe work procedures at all times. We believe that all employee's should go home in the same condition they arrived at work each day. We have therefore adopted the following as "Corporate Safety Philosophies"

We strive for the highest quality

At X-TREME Packaging, we have always taken pride in our custom work, having the opportunity to make season ticket boxes for the Calgary Flames and Stampeders was an honour. You don't need a big name to receive the same level of quality though, we use the same quality standards for every customer.

ZUGA Natural Sweetener

Looking for the best zero-calorie natural sweetener? You’re in the right place! Zuga tastes like sugar without any of the negative effects.

Shop Now
Why Zuga?
Zero Carbs/Calories

Zuga contributes to a healthy lifestyle by providing a sweetener with no carbs or calories

Antioxidant/Tooth Friendly

Neutralizes free radicals and doesn’t feed oral bacteria

Diabetic/Keto Friendly

Zuga stabilizes insulin, and is perfect for diabetics and low-carb diets

Comes In Many Sizes

With different sizes, you can choose what’s right for you!

Our Story

Our aim is to introduce our sugar substitute not only to store shelves as loose sugar but also into the local food manufacturing stream. We believe that this will reduce or eliminate the amount of hidden sugars consumed by people striving for healthier lifestyles through reduced sugar consumption.

Because everyone deserves a sweetener that doesn’t steal their health!

Learn More
Our Products

With zero carbs and zero calories, our natural sweetener is a great option for diabetics and low-carb lifestyles without sacrificing sweetness! It is also ideal for baking, hot beverages, sports drinks, smoothies, yogurts, and much more!

Our 340g package is the preferred option for persons who want to try Zuga for the first time. It is a great size to share with friends and family and a perfect for adding flavor to culinary creations at home!
